location: Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University
inclusion_criteria: LVEF <45% and left ventricular shortening fraction <25%
exclusion of other specific heart conditions
exclusion_criteria: alcoholic cardiomyopathy, peripartum cardiomyopathy, and other acquired DCM
coronary heart disease, pulmonary heart disease, hypertensive heart disease, or pericardial disease
severe systemic diseases or treatments affecting heart structure
receiving cardiac resynchronization therapy or left ventricular assist device during follow-up
main_endpoints: absolute increase in LVEF from >10% to a final value >35%
